translations.Add your profile information! For exampl: Add your profile information! For example your email is needed to reset your password.

translations.A welcome and introduction wizard for Ne: A welcome and introduction wizard for Nextcloud
translations.This application enables a pop-up window:
This application enables a pop-up window when a user first logs into Nextcloud. This window welcomes new users to Nextcloud, and contains links to the standard desktop client, Android app, and the iOS app. The window also shows a link for accessing Nextcloud via WebDAV. At any time, the first run wizard can be opened again via link "About" on settings menu.
The First run wizard can be customized to meet specific design goals, or to change links and messages. Create an appropriate theme following the Theming documentation, and changes to the look and feel of this Wizard are simple. More information is available in the first run wizard documentation, as well as the theming documentation.
translations.Find more than 100 apps in the Nextcloud: Find more than 100 apps in the Nextcloud app store to customise your cloud:

translations.Many others like a music player, a passw: Many others like a music player, a password manager, a kanban app, a download manager or a markdown editor
translations.Nextcloud gives you access to your files: Nextcloud gives you access to your files wherever you are.

translations.If you run Nextcloud in a mission critic: If you run Nextcloud in a mission critical environment with large numbers of users and big amounts of data and need the certainty of support from the experts behind the Nextcloud technology, an Enterprise Subscription from Nextcloud is available with email and phone support.
translations.A safe home for all your data: A safe home for all your data
translations.Nextcloud puts your data at your fingert: Nextcloud puts your data at your fingertips, under your control. Store your documents, calendar, contacts and photos on a server in your company, at home, at one of our providers or in a data center you know.
translations.Host your data and files where you decid: Host your data and files where you decide
translations.%s gives you access to your files wherev: %s gives you access to your files wherever you are. Our easy to use desktop and mobile clients are available for all major platforms at zero cost.
translations.Setup sync clients using an <a href=\"%s: Setup sync clients using an app password. That way you can make sure you are able to revoke access in case you lose that device.
translations.Besides the sync clients you can connect: Besides the sync clients you can connect any other software that supports the WebDAV/CalDAV/CardDAV protocols to %s.
